subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Willie Parker ran for 115 yards and Jeff Reed’s third field goal — a 32-yarder with 11 seconds remaining — won it Sunday as the Steelers rallied to beat the Chargers, 11-10.
snippet: Willie Parker ran for 115 yards and Jeff Reed’s third field goal — a 32-yarder with 11 seconds remaining — won it Sunday as the Steelers rallied to beat the Chargers, 11-10.
